text:
Sounds like a nice helper to work with modules in the DM. Working locally with modules, we can just copy some pieces of the fields.json and paste them to another module. It saves time.
Having something like that in the DM would be awesome too.

Yeah it is useful being able to do it locally, I just prefer in general adding my fields with the gui but that’s probably me being lazy not wanting to learn all the json, also using copy snippet to get all the hubl for images and cta’s etc is pretty useful in the DM
